label: G4 NPS FM: Flush-Mount Parking Occupancy Sensor
description: The Nwave G4 NPS FM is a flush-mount, in-ground parking occupancy sensor designed for surface-level installation, ideal for regions with heavy snowplow activity. This advanced sensor uses LoRaWAN technology to provide accurate, real-time vehicle detection data, enabling efficient parking management and seamless integration into smart city infrastructure.
